评论概述: Listen to this advice before you purchase.
评论详情: You absolutely must order 2 sizes above normal. If you are a medium order an extra large. If you are a large order a 2XL. The sizes are an entire length off. And then when you wash it, it shrinks one more length. I wear a large and my brother also wears a large but its tight for him. When we tried them on he couldnt even get his on and mine was so tight it was as if I was plastic wrapped and heat shrinked around my body. So I thought OK i'll reorder one size large. I give my cousin the large since he wears a medium and as soon as he put it on it fit perfectly. He was happy. Then he washed it that night, threw it in the dryer, and now he cant fit it.  Order 2 sizes too large, and if its a tad big just keep shrinking it on high in the dryer 30min sessions until its the right size and then air dry from then on or low heat dry only.

评论概述: Good substitute for UA Cold Gear
评论详情: I have a closet full of Under Armour Cold Gear tops that I use for athletics in cooler weather. They are almost unique in having a thin layer of fleece on the inside of the shell, providing some warmth, but not too much. However, UA's Cold Gear has been harder to find in recent years, so I've been looking for a replacement. I couldn't find anything with the same layer of fleece until I broadened my search to include pullovers. These are stretchy like Cold Gear and have a similar layer of fleece on the inside; the quarter-zip provides a little more flexibility in the temperature range, as does the higher collar. And less expensive! So, win, win, win.
I gave this sweater to my husband as a gift for Christmas. It fit him perfectly and look very nice.

Purchased for my son and he loves it! It’s not to thick but still provides the warmth that he needs.

This was a nice quarter zip.  The material was slightly lined for modest warmth but not too heavy.  It is perfect for that day when temperatures are in the 50’s or 60’s.  I wear a medium and it fit true to size.  I also like the color.  It arrived pretty quickly.  I plan on buying a few others as well.

I love the color. However, color doesn't matter when the item doesn't fit as it should. I've been wearing mens' clothing for years because I'm not shaped like most women. So, assuming an XL in men's would do the job as other lines in that mens size usually do, I ordered this shirt. Well, to make a long story short, I'm now wrapping it for a smaller man for Christmas. No matter what the reviews or manufacturer says, it's not true to size. I could return it, but to me that's a pain in the butt. I'd rather donate or give it away.

评论概述: False Advertisement. Not 92% Polyester/8% Spandex as stated
评论详情: My son has a pull over that he wears at work. He works night shift and it gets cold at night, but his job is very active and often in confined spaces so he needs something that's warm, but still easy to move in. The one he has is very high quality but I couldn't find the exact brand, so instead I looked for one with the same fabric blend. This is the only one I found that said it was 92% Polyester and 8% Spandex and I had hoped that it would be of similar quality and thickness. But this one is 100% Polyester. It's quite a bit thinner than the other one too. My son tried it on and thinks it will be fine, but he hasn't had the chance to find out if it will keep him warmer or not. I left it at 2 stars since so far he likes it and I'll come back and adjust the star rating once he's worn it to work for a few weeks.
Appears to be durable and soft. It is a x-mas present so did not open it. Pretty color.

Other than that its a great product for the price- the Wine Red Color is spot on - and you can beat these things up a bit and they are pretty tough - seems to get softer with each wash. I say a full 5 Stars.
